title: Trump’s Georgia Call: Listen to the Audio and Read a Full Transcript
sub_head: President urged Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger to overturn the state’s victory for President-elect Joe Biden
body:
In a Saturday telephone call, President Trump urged Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger to overturn President-elect Joe Biden’s victory in the state. Mr. Trump spent much of the call angrily alleging voting fraud, ballot destruction and other charges, while Mr. Raffensperger rejected pressure to further investigate an election in which there has been no evidence of widespread fraud.
Below is a transcript of the Jan. 2 call:
• President Trump
• Brad Raffensperger, Secretary of State, State of Georgia
• Ryan Germany, General Counsel and Assistant Commissioner of Securities, State of Georgia
